title: Remedial Magic
description: Delve deeper into the world of the fae with this Faeriewalker bonus story from Jenna Black.In "Remedial Magic," Kimber finds that having a prodigy for an older brother is not so funâ€¦especially one who is magic wiz-kid. But Kimber has a plan to finally step out of his shadow.
author: Jenna Black
